title: Looking for High silver/low gold players to climb with.
body:
I am currently S3 top/jg/sup player 
I'm looking for any high silver/low gold players who are dedicated to grind up ranks
can play any role they are comfortable with 
do not need to use voice comms ( but voice comms encouraged)

if interested add me 
IGN - kaiboss

replies.body:
How old?

just sick of voice comms with 12vies
